Package src.controller

Class RoomManager

java.lang.Object
src.controller.RoomManager
public class RoomManager extends Object
RoomManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and RoomView and the model class - Room.

It can initialize or update the room and print Room Status statistic report.

Since:
2022-04-04

      Parameters:
      floorNumber - floor number of the room
      roomNumber - room number of the room
      roomStatus - room status of the room
      guestId - Id of the guest to be added/removed from the room
      Returns:
      true if successful. Otherwise, false if the room id not found.

    • createRoom

      public static Room createRoom(RoomType roomType, String roomId, int floorNumber, int roomNumber, RoomStatus roomStatus, boolean isWifiEnabled, boolean isSmokingAllowed)
      Method to create rooms

      See RoomType For the different room type

      See RoomStatus For the different status of the room

      Parameters:
      roomType - Type of the room
      roomId - the room Id for the room
      floorNumber - Floor number of the room
      roomNumber - Room number of the room
      roomStatus - Status of the room
      isWifiEnabled - whether the wifi is enabled in the room
      isSmokingAllowed - whether the smoking is allowed in the room
      Returns:
      Room object that is being created

    • calculateRoomPrice

      public static double calculateRoomPrice(RoomType roomType, boolean isWifiEnabled)
      Calculate the price of the room.

      Call PromotionManager to get room price.

      Parameters:
      roomType - Type of the room
      isWifiEnabled - whether the wifi is enabled or not
      Returns:
      the price of the room

      public static boolean validateRoomId(String roomId)
      Validate the hotel has this room id or not
      Parameters:
      roomId - room id of the room you want to check
      Returns:
      true if contains this room. Otherwise, false if room id does not exist.

    • checkRoomVacancy

      public static boolean checkRoomVacancy(String roomId, RoomStatus roomStatus)
      Check if the room has vacancy

      See RoomStatus for the different types of room status

      Parameters:
      roomId - room id of the room you want to check
      roomStatus - room status of the room to compare
      Returns:
      true if this room has vacancy. Otherwise, false if room id does not exist

    • validateNumOfPax

      public static boolean validateNumOfPax(String roomId, int numOfPax)
      Validate if the number of pax exceeds the maximum capacity of the room or not.
      Parameters:
      roomId - room id of the room you want to check
      numOfPax - the number of pax of the room
      Returns:
      true if the number of pax does not exceed the room capacity. Otherwise, false if number of pax is not valid.

    • updateRoomGuestDetails

      public static boolean updateRoomGuestDetails(String roomId, String guestId)
      Method to update the room's guest details.

      Calls GuestManager to retrieve guest details.

      Parameters:
      roomId - room id of the room you want to update
      guestId - guest id of the guest
      Returns:
      true if updating of guest details is successful. Otherwise, false if guest id does not exist.
